name: MBOXO Email Format
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension"></field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: MBOXO is one of the MBOX family of related file formats used for holding collections of email messages within a single file. MBOXO files add a greater-than sign (“>”) before the "From " at the start of a line (“>From ”).
